snippet.title: Sprint Car Challenge - PlayStation 2 Gameplay
snippet.description:
Push your driving abilities to the limit at the wheel of winged Sprint Cars. Powerslide in light-weight high-powered cars across dirt ice and snow tracks. With high speed collisions on almost every corner Sprint Car racing is extreme octane motorsport!

Developed by Brain in a Jar, this was one of their budget racing sims. Between 2004 and 2011, they worked with budget publishers like Oxygen Interactive, Blast! Entertainment, Midas Interactive and even Nordic Games (who later became what we know as Embracer Group).

PS2 version published by Oxygen Interactive
Wii version published by Nordic Games in Europe and Maximum Family Games in the US.
Also released Nintendo Wii.

#braininajar #oxygeninteractive #ps2 #playstation2 #retrogaming #retrogames #sprintcarchallenge #sprintcars #sprintcar #nordicgames
